name: singleClick
func: return {payload: "*,*,red"};

name: buttonUp
buttonDown
buttonHold
Rotate 180 Text Red Background Blue Speed 5
Parse METAR
Decrypt Payload
Example A - Two "byte pairs" (4 bytes in total) for Temp and Humidity
For MQTT "user"/"password", use "Application ID"/"default key"
info:
1) Sign in to TTN and go to your application page where "app_1" is your "Application ID" e.g.
https://console.thethingsnetwork.org/applications/app_1

2) For MQTT User, use "Application ID" 

3) For MQTT password, scroll to bottom and use "default key" (you need to press the "eye" to see the long text)

name: Example B - Two "Float value Byte Quads" (8 bytes in total) for Lat. and Longitude (Float)

info:
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
- <CONTROLLER>
<NAME>test 6</NAME>
<TYPENAME>Case Controller (HT)</TYPENAME>
<TYPENUM>12390</TYPENUM>
<ID>0988</ID>
<VER>MERCM04</VER>
<TIME>17:06:12 17/04/02</TIME>
<ALARMMASK>0x0260</ALARMMASK>
- <IO>
- <INPUTS>
<FP ID="CTRL" NAME="Control temp." MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<FP ID="DISP" NAME="Display temp." MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<FP ID="AIRON" NAME="Air on Probe" MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<FP ID="AIROF" NAME="Air off Probe" MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<FP ID="EVAP" NAME="Evaporator Probe" MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<FP ID="SUCT" NAME="Suc. Line Probe" MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<FP ID="SHEAT" NAME="Superheat" MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<FP ID="LOGPR" NAME="Logging Probe" MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<STR ID="PLTFT" NAME="Plant Fault" VALS="OK | Alarm">OK</STR>
<STR ID="CCSWT" NAME="Case Clean" VALS="Off | On">Off</STR>
</INPUTS>
- <OUTPUTS>
<STR ID="LLRLY" NAME="Liq. Line Valve" VALS="Closed | Open">Closed</STR>
<STR ID="SLRLY" NAME="Suc. Line Valve" VALS="Open | Closed">Closed</STR>
<STR ID="DFRLY" NAME="Defrost Control" VALS="Off | On">On</STR>
<STR ID="LTRLY" NAME="Lights" VALS="Off | On">On</STR>
<STR ID="FNRLY" NAME="Case Fans" VALS="Off | On">On</STR>
<TIME ID="LDFTM" NAME="Last Def. Time" MIN="00:00" MAX="23:59" STEP="00:01"
UNIT="hh:mm">17:00</TIME>
<TIME ID="LDFLN" NAME="Last Def. Length" MIN="00:00" MAX="03:00" STEP="00:01"
UNIT="hh:mm">00:06</TIME>
<FP ID="LDFT" NAME="Last Def. Temp." MIN="-49.0" MAX="60.0" STEP="0.1"
UNIT="C">N/A</FP>
<STR ID="LDFTY" NAME="Last Def. Type" VALS="None | Internal | External | Network |
Display | Timed">Timed</STR>
</OUTPUTS>
- <STATES>
<STR ID="STATE" NAME="Control State" VALS="Stabilise | Normal | Df_Min | Df_Max |
Drain_Down | Fan_Delay | Recovery | OT_Alarm | UT_Alarm | Fans_Only |
Lights_Only | Case_Off">Df_Max</STR>
</STATES>
- <COMMANDS>
<STR ID="DFCMD" NAME="Defrost Command" VALS="Normal | Defrost | ElecDf | DefTerm |
Standby | CaseOff | FansOnly">Normal</STR>
</COMMANDS>
</IO>
</CONTROLLER>

func: return {payload: "*,*,off"};

name: Initialize
func: return {payload: "stty -F /dev/ttyACM1"};

name: Set Network ID
Set Network Key
Set Freq SubBand
func:
//return {payload: 'echo "AT+FSB=7" > /dev/ttyACM1'};
return {payload: 'echo "AT+FSB=1" > /dev/ttyACM1'};

name: Join
func: return {payload: 'echo "AT+JOIN" > /dev/ttyACM1'};

name: Public
Save
func: return {payload: 'echo "AT&W" > /dev/ttyACM1'};

name: Joined Network
Not Joined
LoRa
func:
var value = msg.payload
return {payload: "echo AT+SEND="+value+" > /dev/ttyACM1"};

name: Firmware
func: return {payload: 'echo "ATI" > /dev/ttyACM1'};

name: Class C Device
func: return {payload: 'echo "AT+DC=C" > /dev/ttyACM1'};

name: Decrypt Payload
Example A - Two "byte pairs" (4 bytes in total) for Temp and Humidity
For MQTT "user"/"password", use "Application ID"/"default key"
info:
1) Sign in to TTN and go to your application page where "app_1" is your "Application ID" e.g.
https://console.thethingsnetwork.org/applications/app_1

2) For MQTT User, use "Application ID" 

3) For MQTT password, scroll to bottom and use "default key" (you need to press the "eye" to see the long text)

name: set device_name
Update Device
Config new device
input json format
func:
msg.api_method=msg.payload.API_METHOD;
return msg;

name: Config delete device
sample injet new device
payload: {"API_METHOD":"PUT","APP_DEFAULT_KEY":"YOUR_TTN_APPLICATION_KEY","APP_ID":"YOUR TTN APP ID","APP_EUI":"YOUR TTN APP EUI","DEV_ID":"anewdevice","DEV_DESCRIPTION":"Created from nodered","DEV_LATITUDE":52.456,"DEV_LONGITUDE":4.887}
